halving_schedule.note: No discrete halvings - 23% annual decay in mining rewards

mining.dominant_hardware: Goldshell KD5, Goldshell KD6, Bitmain Antminer KA3

largest_pool.name: Poolflare
largest_pool.note: Historical data from Dec 2021 - current data unavailable due to shutdown

market_data.notes: Data as of Oct 23, 2025 following organizational shutdown announcement

mining_data: Historical pool data from various sources

notes: Chainweb architecture: 20 parallel blockchains braided together
70% mining allocation over 120 years represents most miner-favorable distribution among smart contract platforms
Organization announced shutdown Oct 21, 2025 but decentralized network continues operating
All investor/contributor vesting completed by Oct 2022
Mining unprofitable at current prices - threatens network security
Extreme pool centralization (74% in single pool historically)
Platform emissions end Nov 2029 - miners achieve parity with total premine
No staking mechanism exists - pure PoW consensus
